text: The Federal Assembly (, , , ) is Switzerland's federal legislature. It meets in Bern in the Federal Palace. The Federal Assembly is bicameral, being made- up of the 200-seat National Council and the 46-seat Council of States. The houses have same powers. Members of both houses represent the cantons. ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Government of Switzerland Category:Bicameral legislatures Category:National legislatures
title: Federal Assembly (Switzerland)
